definition: to cut off (a length)/to stop/to intercept/section/chunk/length
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: The screen capture shows on the right an example of a task presentation.
sentences.chinese: 截图的右面显示了一个任务表示的示例。

sentences.english: As you can see in the screenshots a VWF is already implemented and working.
sentences.chinese: 就像你看到的截图那样已经可以运行了。

sentences.english: The number of seconds to wait before taking the screenshot.
sentences.chinese: 在照下萤幕截图前等待的秒数。

sentences.english: The above screenshot shows what's going on in it's head—the different images represent different stages of Natal's computational process.
sentences.chinese: 上面的截图显示了纳塔尔思考过程。

sentences.english: When completed, your screen should now represent the following screen capture.
sentences.chinese: 完成之后，屏幕现在应该显示下述截图。

sentences.english: Note that in our screenshot we show all of the available metrics options.
sentences.chinese: 请注意，在截图中显示了所有可用的度量选项。

sentences.english: The screenshots below show how the “Send Reply” feature works.
sentences.chinese: 下面的截图展示了“发送回复”功能如何运作的。

sentences.english: The screens below show examples of English and Chinese home pages.
sentences.chinese: 下面的屏幕截图显示了英语和中文主页的示例。

sentences.english: The next screenshot illustrates fill color formatting defined on the server.
sentences.chinese: 下一张截图示范在服务器上设计的填充色格式。

sentences.english: This report layout is also illustrated by the following screen capture.
sentences.chinese: 这个报告布局如下面的屏幕截图所示。

sentences.english: Screenshot Captor is a program for taking screenshots on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 截图捕手是一个以计算机上的屏幕截图程序。

sentences.english: Screenshot Captor is a program for taking screenshots on your computer.
sentences.chinese: 截图捕手是一个以计算机上的屏幕截图程序。

sentences.english: Currently, the only way to capture screenshots is through the WP7 emulator.
sentences.chinese: 目前，只有这样才能捕捉截图通过涡喷7的模拟器。

sentences.english: Another quick feature this app comes with is the capturing of screenshots.
sentences.chinese: 本软件自带的另一个快速特性是屏幕截图功能。

sentences.english: Adjust you colors in accordance with the screenshot.
sentences.chinese: 根据屏幕截图来调整你的色彩。

sentences.english: I ve attached a screenshot that illustrates this feature.
sentences.chinese: 本人已附上截图，说明了此功能。

definition: screenshot/to capture an image displayed on a computer screen
Moments (social networking function of smartphone app WeChat 微信[Wei1 xin4])
to transmit/to forward (mail, SMS, packets of data)/to pass on/to republish (an article from another publication)
